content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the case involved a division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the immovable property included a plot of land with a house and a wastewater treatment plant as well as nonresidential premises the movable property consisted of three vehicles the court decided to divide the property based on the applicants selfemployment and need for certain vehicles for business activities the court awarded the garage box to the applicant and the bmw 3 series to the defendant the defendant was ordered to pay the applicant compensation for their share of the property the text also mentioned other legal matters related to joint matrimonial property such as the determination of asset value and the classification of shareable and personal property the text also discussed a separate legal case involving the dissolution of marriage child custody and maintenance payments the court was asked to order the defendant to pay monthly maintenance payments for the child and to establish the residence of the child with the mother the defendant disputed the arrangements and requested detailed access arrangements and lists of expenses the court also discussed another case involving a defect in a vehicle and the division of matrimonial property the court rejected the applicants claim for personal property rights and divided the property between the parties the court awarded the applicant one vehicle and ordered the defendant to pay compensation the court partially upheld the claims of the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay certain costs the court made a decision to dissolve the marriage and divide the property and the specific details of the property division were listed the court also ordered the applicant to pay compensation to the defendant and assigned responsibility for various costs
